name: My Singing Monsters Playground
overview: It's the Singing Monsters like you've never seen them before. Journey to the Monster World to take part in a tournament of Monster-Game madness! Watch your favorite Monsters come to life as you swing, fling, and spring your way to victory in a variety of 4-player competitions. Grab your friends and hit the Playground to see who has what it takes to win the ultimate Monster bash! Local Multiplayer Madness Compete against friends and family in games galore set across the Monster World Starring the Singing Monsters Take control of some of your favorite characters from the world of My Singing Monsters Variety of Game Types Team up to take on your competition in 2v2 games or battle it out for solo supremacy in free-for-all matches. Ways to Play Play the way you want with friends or solo in three different game modes: Party Tournament, Single Player Gauntlet, or Freeplay!
